formattedAddress: 645 Madison Avenue, and 4th Floors, Entrance on, E 60th St #3rd, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 645 Madison Avenue, and 4th Floors, Entrance on, E 60th St #3rd, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
Iâ€™d dealt with horrible nerve pain for over 6 months. After multiple doctors, misdiagnoses, six MRIs, physical therapy and a whole host of other failed remedies, I was referred to Dr. Smith.
I was given his name on a Monday, called Rothman that day and had an appointment for that Wednesday. At the appointment, within a minute of reviewing my scans, Dr. Smith found a disc herniation on my very first MRI that the radiologist missed. This had caused months of unnecessary pain and struggle.
Dr. Smith explained everything about the issue and laid out my options. I decided surgery was the best next step for me and my goals.
I sit here a month later and I am 2 weeks post-op from a disc replacement that has already resolved so much pain (and anxiety).
Dr. Smithâ€™s thoughtful communication, breadth of knowledge & experience, and his quiet confidence won me over. More than that, he just seems like a nice guy! I never once questioned the decision to work with him.
His team (huge shout out to his Clinical Assistant Dana and PA Mackenzie) and the staff I interact with at Rothman are just on another level compared to any other facility Iâ€™ve been to.
While I have some more recovery & healing ahead of me, I know I am in the right hands and I am beyond grateful for the care Iâ€™ve already received.

originalText.text: Having just had major back surgery carried out by Doctor Michael Smith at Rothman, I have been incredibly impressed by everyone working there, and, of course, by Doctor Smith. He came highly recommended to me by a number of sources, and those recommendations proved right on the mark. I cannot say enough good things about Doctor Smith, his surgical assistant Mackenzie Cooke, and  all the other staff at the New York City practice.

originalText.text: Wonderful experience from beginning to end. They see you in a timely manner which I love, in and out the office fast enough. The staff is very attentive and so far the Drs that I have seen there are exceptional so are their PA. The office is clean, neat and inviting. I recommend them to my friends and family. Thanks ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: One of the best experiences I've had on a doctor's visit, ever! Dr. Hrubis is excellent and she answered all my questions with clear detail. The staff is friendly and on it. So glad to have found this office!

text.text: One of the best experiences I've had on a doctor's visit, ever! Dr. Hrubis is excellent and she answered all my questions with clear detail. The staff is friendly and on it. So glad to have found this office!

originalText.text: Very unprofessional behavior of the clinic (not the doctor) to call me on the day of my mother's follow up appointment that they stopped taking her insurance several days BEFORE the actual appointment. I had already requested time off from work to accompany my mother, but lo and behold, the clinic doesn't think their patient's and the patient's family members' time is worth anything. Very lacking in courtesy and integrity. Will never recommended this clinic to anybody.
